Name: Carthusian Nail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: A Chartreuse-influenced riff on the classic Rusty Nail .
History: Created in 2010 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Carthusian Nail contains 197 calories
